CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 15, 1958, pg. A6, reads: "Letsche TV Dancers - Letsche School pupils who appeared as Mexican dancers on KDKA-TV's Monday program, 'Rhythmics in Pittsburgh's Public Schools' are (seated) Charles Thomas, and (standing, left to right) Hattie Nettles, Ellis Montague and Loretta Clancy. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Letsche School students Hattie Nettles, Ellis Montague, Loretta Clancy, and Charles Thomas seated in front, in "Mexican dancer" costumes for "Rhythmics in Pittsburgh Public Schools" program on KDKA television
